data.text: E ndalono wendni nower e piny Juda ni:
Yaw dhorangeye
Inirit gi kwe ngʼatno ma parone oriere tir,
Gen kuom Jehova Nyasaye nyaka chiengʼ,
Odwoko piny joma otingʼore malo,
Tiende joma ithiro
Yor joma kare opie,
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, wuotho e yore mag chikeni ema warito,
Chunya gombi gotieno
Kata obedo ni ngʼwono itimone joricho,
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, isetingʼo badi malo,
Jehova Nyasaye, isemiyowa kwe;
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa,
To koro jogo osetho kendo koro gionge;
Isemedo ogandawa, yaye Jehova Nyasaye,
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye,
Mana kaka dhako man-gi ich machiegni nywol
Wasebedo gi ich,
To jogi mosenindo kuom Jehova Nyasaye,
Dhiuru, un joga, donjuru e uteu
To ne, Jehova Nyasaye biro kawuok kare mar dak
